item.title: Walnut Tealight Holder
item.description: Walnut Tealight Holder Still horrendous at making things with my hands but will keep trying! This is a tealight holder that is basically three bits of wood, two drill holes and glue. Band Saw Pillar Drilling Machine 1 1⁄2” Forstner Bit Sand Paper Wood Glue Circular Saw Lessons learnt Buying Wood Walnut is a beautiful dark hardwood Walnut is expensive A DIY Store will sell wood at fixed lengths, but will cut it into pieces for you.
